text: Rosemarie Myrdal (born May 20, 1929) is an American Republican Party politician. She was the second female, and 35th Lieutenant Governor of North Dakota from 1993 to 2001 under Governor of North Dakota Ed Schafer. She also was in the North Dakota House of Representatives from 1985 to 1992. ==References== Category:Lieutenant Governors of North Dakota Category:1929 births Category:Living people Category:People from Minot, North Dakota Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Rosemarie Myrdal
